description.en:
An ordinary corporate slave, Ding Xueyang, has a secret - he has a special ability! But his special ability has a flaw; if he is seen using it, the special ability will be randomized to a new one.

For over twenty years, in order to keep this secret, Ding Xueyang has been living very cautiously. He didn't have a significant other, didn't make any friends, and didn't even keep a pet.

Until one day, a homeless person came across his secret, and from then on Ding Xueyang has plunged into an abyss of suffering!

altTitles.ja: アイドル×アイドル　ストーリー！

description.en:
Mimi Nagisa (22 years old) is a former idol. After giving up on her dream of being an idol because of her lacking talent she spends her days working part-time while attending college. However, the moment she meets the idol Ibuki Nanakusa, whom she recently found interest in, their lives begin to cross each other.

(Source: Comic Fuz, translated)

[Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/idol2story_info)
description.ja: 才能がないと夢を諦めた元アイドルのミミと、ミミに憧れていた現役アイドル・イブキ。そんな2人が、ひょんな出会いから一緒にサバイバルオーディション番組への出演を目指すことに…!?　一度は諦めかけた夢、今度こそ2人でなら…！
description.ru: Мими Нагиса (22 года) — бывший айдол. После того, как она отказалась от своей мечты стать айдолом из-за отсутствия таланта, она проводит дни работая на неполный рабочий день, учась в колледже. Однако в тот момент, когда она встречает кумира Ибуки Нанакуса, к которому она недавно проявляла интерес, их жизни начинают пересекаться.

altTitles.en: Crow in the Starry Sky

altTitles.ja: 星空のカラス

altTitles.en: 星空之鸦

description.en: Waka is a 13 year-old Go-lover! Learning from her grandfather, a pro go player, she comes to enjoy connecting with the people around her, regardless of age or gender. One day, she meets the young genius go player, Sagisaka Souji, in a match that tore at both body and soul, and so she decides to become a pro go player herself!

A naga starts a new job in a new town.

Posted with [author permission](https://twitter.com/DanielLCarrier/status/1769140595296207140).

title.en: The Duke of Death and His Maid

altTitles.fr: Le duc de la Mort et sa gouvernante obscure

altTitles.ru: Смертоносный герцог и его черная горничная

altTitles.ar: النبيل الشاب حاصد الأرواح و خادمته السوداء

altTitles.ja: 死神坊ちゃんと黒メイド

altTitles.en: The Duke of Death and His Black Maid

description.en:
In a large mansion lives a boy, an aristocrat who was cursed by the witch to "let everything he touches die." With him is his maid Alice, who besides serving him, likes to tease him. The boy who is interested in her doesn't mind the teasing, but not being able to touch her is painful!  
  
If they are unable to hold hands, how will their love ever bloom?
description.tr: Hikâye büyük bir malikanede yaşayan kaderi bir cadı tarafından mühürlenen bir çocuk ve onunla beraber yaşayan hizmetçi Alice hakkında; çocuk dokunduğu her şeyi ölüme sürüklerken; Alice ile hiç el ele tutuşamayacak olmalarına rağmen yaşanan inişli çıkışlı bir aşk.

title.en: Sachiiro no One Room Gaiden - Seikai no Meitantei

altTitles.ja: 幸色のワンルーム　外伝　正壊の名探偵
正壊の名探偵

altTitles.en: One Room of Happiness Spin-off - The Corrupt Detective
The Corrupt Detective

altTitles.pl: Pokój w kolorach szczęścia. Genialny detektyw Matsubase

altTitles.ru: Цвета счастья в одной комнате: коррумпированный детектив

description.en:
This is the story of Detective Matsubase three years before he fatefully meets xxx.

Hijiri Matsubase finally quits the police force and fulfills his dream of running his own detective agency. However, life isn't smooth sailing as it seems and the poor guy is in massive debt after getting scammed. Luckily, or unluckily for Matsubase… Aketoyo, the son of a billionaire reaches out to him for a deal. "Entertain me, I'll pay you $100,000 per case." A deal with the devil can be oh so enticing.  
(source: AOC Translations)

altTitles.ja: ろんぐらいだぁす!

description.en: The manga follows Ami Kurata, a first year college student with no special qualities. One day she happens to notice someone riding a folding bike, immediately falls in love with it, and uses all her savings to buy one. She eventually gets introduced to the world of long-distance bicycling and road racer bikes, and she forms a cycling team called Fortuna with four other female college students from the same school. Their goal is to ride in a "brevet" or long-distance event called "flèche."

altTitles.ja: ちがう宮原おまえじゃない！

altTitles.en: No, Miyahara, Not You!

altTitles.ja: ちが宮

altTitles.en: NoMiya

description.en: The manga centers on Arima, a boy who has a crush on a girl named Yukihira. But every time he tries to make a move to get closer to Yukihira, his other friend Miyahara just happens to be in the scene and will always mistakenly think that Arima is making a move on her. (Source: [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2022-11-11/midori-obiya-launches-new-manga-mini-series/.191780))
description.ja: 憧れの女子”雪比良さん”と仲良くなるべく奮闘する有馬！ でもなぜか、いつもイイところであらわれるのは…。 末永〜く見守りたい！中学生３人の青春ラブコメ、ここに開幕っ！
description.vi: Câu chuyện diễn biến xung quanh Arima - một cậu bạn sơ trung phải lòng một bạn nữ cùng lớp tên Yukihira. Nhưng mỗi khi cậu ấy chuẩn bị tiến gần hơn với Yukihara thì cô bạn thuở nhỏ Miyahara lại bất chợt xuất hiện lúc nào chẳng hay làm cho mọi người lầm tưởng rằng Arima đang nhắm đến cô bạn đó hơn là Yukihara.
description.pt-br: Arima, é um garoto apaixonado por uma garota chamada Yukihira. Mas toda vez que ele tenta ficar mais próximo de Yukihira, sua outra amiga, Miyahara simplesmente entra em cena e sempre pensa erroneamente que Arima está fazendo seus movimentos por ela.

altTitles.en: Forced Attack 100%

description.en:
An accident forced two handsome schoolboys who originally disliked each other to bind together in a love game. Chi Che became a game player, while Cen Huang’s soul left his body to become a game system. In order to return back to normal, both player and system can only brace themselves and complete the rest of the game’s strategy missions. What’s outrageous is that the attack target is unexpectedly Cen Huang’s soulless body?! Thus, a straight guy helping another straight guy pursue his own dramatic love game has now begun…

A dangerous control freak senior who refuses to socialize x an optimistic talkative junior who lacks love.

altTitles.ja: あくまであまい私の彼女

description.ja: 甘いものが大好きな女の子・天井真衣は、付き合っていた彼女に振られて傷心中。ある日、勤務先のカフェの新人としてやってきた美少女・黒崎梨々に一目惚れをするも、なんと彼女は"サキュバス"という悪魔で……？パフェもあなたも食べちゃいたい♡ ポップでキュートな悪魔ティックガールズラブコメ、スタート！

altTitles.ja: 魔女は満月に咲く

altTitles.en: Witch Bloom Under the Full Moon

description.en: Koichi Hotaka is a second-year junior high school student who is a bit of a shy. One day, he meets a mysterious girl, Shima, who calls herself the "Witch of Alstroemeria" and is chosen as her "contractor". A fantasy of love and magic set on the night of the full moon!
description.ja: 帆高航一（ほたか　こういち）はちょっとコジラセ気味な中学2年生。そんな彼はある日、「アルストロメリアの魔女」を名乗る謎の少女・紫麻（しま）と出会い、彼女の“契約者”に選ばれる。満月の夜を舞台に繰り広げられる、恋と魔法のファンタジー！
description.zh: 帆高航一是个有点内向的初二学生。某一天，他遇到了一个神秘的女孩紫麻，她自称“阿尔斯特罗梅里亚的女巫”，并被选为她的“契约者”。 在满月之夜缔结的爱情和魔法的幻想故事！

altTitles.zh: 我的食物看起来很可爱

altTitles.en: My Food Seems to Be Very Cute

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ de shíwù kàn qǐlái hěn kě'ài

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的食物看起來很可愛

description.en: A vampire who has been sleeping for nearly two hundred years, Maria is awakened by a passing werewolf girl by a chance, and the moment the coffin is opened, the curse falls on the werewolf girl. The two girls set foot on the journey to the city
description.es-la: Maria, una vampiro que había estado durmiendo por casi doscientos años, es despertada por Xing Lan, una chica lobo que pasaba por ahí. Cuando el ataúd se abre, una maldición cae sobre Xing Lan. Sin embargo, en lugar de asustarse, la inocente Xing Lan cree haber encontrado una excelente compañera, y ambas embarcan juntas un viaje a la ciudad. Así comienza su historia.

altTitles.ja: 佐々木と宮野

description.en: It all started like a typical old-school boys’ love plotline—bad-boy senior meets adorably awkward underclassman, one of them falls in love, and so on and so forth. But although Miyano is a self-proclaimed boys’ love expert, he hasn’t quite realized…he’s in one himself. Which means it’s up to Sasaki to make sure their story has a happily ever after…!

title.en: NEET ni Natteita Hatsukoi no Hito wo Shiawase ni Suru made

altTitles.ja: ニートになっていた初恋の人を幸せにするまで

altTitles.en: Until I Make My First Love-Turned-NEET Happy

description.en: Ten years ago he moved away from his first love. Now working in Tokyo, he's excited to find that she's living next door. But instead of the confident girl he left behind, now all that remains is a chubby NEET. Can he bring her happiness?

altTitles.ja: 嫌がってるキミが好き

altTitles.en: I Like You With That Look of Repulsion

description.en:
It finally happened, Shirakawa Mikoto was confessed to for the first time in her life! Otsuki Makoto wasn’t exactly her ideal man but, she wanted to have a boyfriend to show off to her friends. It turns out dating someone you don’t even know can be complicated, especially if they are a bit strange.  
This is a raunchy, heart pounding love story. Expect goosebumps and some doki doki action on the side.

title.en: Boushoku no Berserk: Ore Dake Level to Iu Gainen o Toppa Suru

altTitles.fr: Berserk de la Gourmandise : Celui qui surpasse le concept même de niveaux

altTitles.en: Berserk of Gluttony

altTitles.ja: Boushoku no Berserk: Ore Dake Level to Iu Gainen o Toppa Suru
暴食のベルセルク～俺だけレベルという概念を突破する～ THE COMIC

altTitles.zh-hk: 狂怒的暴食 ～僅自己突破了等級這概念～

altTitles.zh: 狂怒的暴食 ～只有我突破了等级这概念～

altTitles.en: Berserk of Gluttony: The One that Exceeds the Concept of Levels

description.en: In this world, there are two types of people. Those Who have powerful "skills", and those who don't. People born with powerful skills, exterminate monsters to level up and become successful, while people without them, become failures, who are treated harshly by society. Follow the story of Fate, a guy who works as a gatekeeper, and whose only skill is gluttony, a skill that only makes him hungry.
description.fr:
Dans ce monde, il y a deux types de personnes. Ceux qui ont un ou plusieurs "talents", et ceux qui n'en possèdent pas. Les personnes nées avec de puissant talents, exterminent les monstres pour monter en niveaux et devenir puissants, alors que ceux qui n'en possèdent pas deviennent des échecs et sont traités durement par la société. Nous suivons l'histoire de Fate, un homme travaillant comme garde aux portes de la ville et dont son seul talents est la gourmandise, un talent qui ne fait que lui donner faim.  


---
description.ro:
În lumea asta sunt două tipuri de oameni: cei care posedă “puteri” incredibile și cei care nu.  
Cei care au fost născuți cu asemenea “puteri” extermină monștrii, evoluează și devin oameni de success, în timp ce ceilalți devin eșecuri, și sunt tratați diferit de societate.  
Citește povestea lui Fate, un tip ce lucrează ca și gardian, a cărui putere este lăcomia, o putere care îl face să fie mereu înfometat.   
  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/isshiki_ichika)  
- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6887dt/) (Raw)  
- Original Comic on **[** [Comic Ride](http://comicride.jp/gluttony/) **|** [NicoNico](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/31663) **]** (Raw)
description.ru:
В этом мире есть два типа людей. Те, у кого есть сильные «навыки», и те, кто их не имеет. Люди, рожденные с мощными навыками, уничтожают монстров, чтобы стать успешными, в то время как люди без них становятся неудачниками, к которым жестоко относится общество. В нашей истории, парень, который работает в качестве привратника, и чье единственное умение — обжорство, умение, которое только делает его голодным.   
  


---
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, existem dois tipos de pessoas. Aqueles que têm poderosas “habilidades” e aqueles que não. As pessoas nascidas com habilidades poderosas exterminam monstros para subirem de nível e se tornarem bem-sucedidas, enquanto as pessoas sem eles, tornam-se fracassos, que são tratados com dureza pela sociedade. Fate é um cara que trabalha como um porteiro, e cuja única habilidade é a gula, uma habilidade que o faz comer almas.

title.en: NEET dakedo Hello Work ni Ittara Isekai ni Tsuretekareta

altTitles.en: I'm a NEET but when I went to Hello Work I got taken to another world

altTitles.ru: Я NEET, но когда пошёл устраиваться на работу, попал в иной мир

altTitles.ja: ニートだけどハロワにいったら異世界につれてかれた

altTitles.zh: 尼特族的异世界就职记

description.en:
The 23-year-old NEET Masaru Yamano went to Hello Work and found an interesting job offer. 
 
_"A sword and sorcery fantasy, playtest for Miniature Garden of Razgrad World. Extended period of time, preferred to be able to live on-site. Monthly salary of 250,000+ yen."_ 
 
He immediately goes to the interview and signs a contract. However, the place of employment is another world. Because of the contract, he’s taken there. To survive, Masaru receives a cheat, but he is told the shocking truth: the world will be destroyed in 20 years! Can a simple NEET prevent the destruction of the world?!
description.ru:
23-летний безработный Ямано Масару отправился в Hello Work и нашёл интересное предложение работы.  
«Тестовая игра в маленьком саду «Мир Разград». Срок работы длительный, с проживанием на рабочем месте. Оплата: 250 000 иен + комиссия.»  
Пройдя собеседование и подписав договор, Масару попадает на место своей новой работы — другой мир! Согласно договору, Масару получил особую способность, а вскоре узнал шокирующую правду: «этот мир будет уничтожен через 20 лет». Сможет ли простой безработный предотвратить разрушение мира?!

title.en: Saikyou Skill "Inochigoi" de Kuyashii Kedo Musou Shichau Moto Maou-sama no Sekai Seifuku Katsudou

altTitles.ja: 最強スキル「命乞い」で悔しいけど無双しちゃう元魔王様の世界征服活動

altTitles.ja-ro: Saikyou Skill "Inochigoi" de Kuyashii Kedo Musou Shichau Moto Maou-sama no Sekai Seifuku Katsudou

altTitles.en: Her Strongest Ability Is Begging for Mercy, the Frustrating World Conquest Adventures of a Former Demon King

altTitles.vi: Hành Trình Chinh Phục Thế Giới Đầy Nhục Nhã của Cựu Ma Vương Với Kỹ Năng Thượng Thừa "Cầu Xin Tha Mạng"

description.en:
Village girl Chelsea, who is beloved by everyone, is actually the reincarnated ex-Demon King.
However, when she reincarnated, for some reason neither her magical powers nor skills were inherited, and she was forced to live as a normal human being.

Humiliating days continued until one day, the remnants of the Demon King's army appeared to loot the village. Hunted down by her former subordinate, who did not realize her true identity, Chelsea finds herself in a perilous situation. Then, a skill finally manifests! The name of that skill is "Begging for Mercy"!?
description.ja: 誰からも愛される村娘のチェルシーは、実は転生した元魔王。 しかし、転生の際になぜか魔力もスキルも引き継げず、ただの人間としての生活を強いられることに…。 そんな屈辱の日々が続くある日、村に魔王軍の残党が略奪に現れる。 自分の正体に気づかない元部下に追い詰められ、絶体絶命のピンチに陥るチェルシーだが、ついにそこでスキルが発現！ そのスキルの名は――「命乞い」!?

altTitles.en: Windbreaker
Wind Breaker (Nii Satoru)

altTitles.ja: ウィンドブレイカー

description.en: Haruka Sakura wants nothing to do with weaklings—he's only interested in the strongest of the strong. He's just started at Furin High School, a school of degenerates known only for their brawling strength—strength they use to protect their town from anyone who wishes it ill. But Haruka's not interested in being a hero or being part of any sort of team—he just wants to fight his way to the top!
description.fr:
Haruka Sakura est le genre de lycéen qui fait passer la baston avant les révisions. Fraîchement débarqué en ville, c'est donc le sourire aux lèvres qu'il compte pousser les portes du lycée Fûrin, l'établissement scolaire au pire taux de délinquance du pays... Les intentions de Haruka sont claires : se mesurer aux meilleurs bagarreurs de ce bahut et devenir le meilleur de tous ! Mais entre-temps, il se retrouve mêlé à une altercation avec une bande de brutes dans un des quartiers de la ville, avant d'être sauvé in extremis par des élèves de son lycée. Haruka réalise alors à quel genre de phénomènes il risque d'avoir affaire...

Maison d'édition FR : Pika
description.pt-br: A Fûrin High School ganhou a pior reputação entre as escolas da região por ter a média mais baixa e os alunos mais rebeldes. E nela ingressa Haruka Sakura, um jovem que acaba de chegar na cidade, que busca ser o mais forte para poder proteger todos com quem se importa. Para atingir seu objetivo, porém, a primeira coisa que ele deve fazer é se juntar a uma gangue chamada Wind Breaker, que representa seu instituto e cujo objetivo é defender a cidade de outras gangues e bandidos. No entanto, para que eles o aceitem, ele terá que ganhar o respeito deles com os punhos!

altTitles.en: My Feelings Can Wait

description.en:
During the wedding of the famous actress, Jing Xiu, Weibo was flooded instead by the shocking headline "New Hit Actress Ji Youyan Dies of Alcohol Poisoning". The headlines were soon changed when the wedding was called off... for reasons unknown.

Ji Youyan suddenly wakes up three years back in time, two years after she broke up with Jing Xiu. This time, she swears to never lose her again...

altTitles.ja: なおざりダンジョン

title.en: The Hundred Ghost Stories That Led to My Death

altTitles.ja: 僕が死ぬだけの百物語
Boku ga Shinu dake no Hyakumonogatari

altTitles.en: 100 Ghost Stories to Die For
Hundred Ghost Stories of My Own Death

description.en: Anthology horror series detailing the "Round of 100 Ghost Stories", an old folktale believed to originate from Japan retold through the lens of Yuuma, a boy who lives in a troubled household. Often used as a test of courage where participants tell one hundred supernatural stories and blow out one candle then look at themselves in the mirror after they finish each story. When the one-hundredth candle is blown out, it is said that ghosts and demons are summoned to our world.
description.pt-br: Série de terror antológica detalhando a "Rodada das 100 Histórias de Fantasmas", muitas vezes usado como um teste de coragem, onde os participantes contam cem histórias sobrenaturais,  apagam uma vela e se olham no espelho depois de terminar cada história. Quando a centésima vela é apagada, diz-se que fantasmas e demônios são convocados ao nosso mundo. Um antigo conto popular originário do Japão recontado por de Yuuma, um menino que vive em uma casa problemática.

altTitles.ja: 令和のダラさん

altTitles.en: Reiwa Dara-san

description.en:
Seeing it brings misfortune; defiling it brings a curse? Introducing a new era of strangeness, abandoning seriousness!

On a stormy day, a landslide destroys a fence, and siblings who ventured into a long-prohibited area encounter a terrifyingly bizarre creature...
"I'm a curse god, you know!? Don't you think anything of this grotesque form?!?"
The unflappable siblings, rather than being scared, casually call the creature "Dara-San" and grow fond of it!?

Seemingly scary but not at all! A new era of occult comedy that leaves seriousness behind.
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/darasan_PR)
description.es:
Verlo trae desgracia; profanarlo, trae una maldición... Introduciendo una nueva era de extrañeza, ¡abandonando la seriedad!

En un día de tormenta, un desprendimiento de tierra destruye una cerca, y unos hermanos que se aventuraron en una zona prohibida durante mucho tiempo se encuentran con una criatura terroríficamente extraña...
"¡Soy un dios maldito! ¡¿No te importa nada esta forma grotesca?!?"
Los imperturbables hermanos, en lugar de asustarse, llaman casualmente a la criatura "Dara-San" y ¡le cogen cariño!?

Parece que da miedo, ¡pero no! Una nueva era de comedia ocultista que deja atrás la seriedad.
description.es-la:
Verlo trae desgracia; profanarlo, trae una maldición... Introduciendo una nueva era de extrañeza, ¡abandonando la seriedad!

En un día de tormenta, un desprendimiento de tierra destruye una cerca, y unos hermanos que se aventuraron en una zona prohibida durante mucho tiempo se encuentran con una criatura terroríficamente extraña...
"¡Soy un dios maldito! ¡¿No te importa nada esta forma grotesca?!?"
Los imperturbables hermanos, en lugar de asustarse, llaman casualmente a la criatura "Dara-San" y ¡le cogen cariño!?

Parece que da miedo, ¡pero no! Una nueva era de comedia ocultista que deja atrás la seriedad.

altTitles.th: คุณครูพันธุ์หายาก

altTitles.ja: ジーティーオー

description.en:
Meet Eikichi Onizuka, a 22-year-old ex-biker. He's crude, foul-mouthed, and has a split-second temper. His unlikely goal: to be the Greatest High School Teacher in the World! Of course, the only reason he wants to be a teacher is so he can try to score with the hot students…  
Before he can become a full instructor, he's got to work as a student teacher to earn his credentials. Onizuka may think he's the toughest guy on campus, but when he meets his class full of bullies, blackmailers, and scheming sadists, he'll have to prove it.  
  
---
- **Won the 22nd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen**
description.ru:
22-летний Эйкити Онидзука — бестолочь, бывший член банды... и учитель?
Великий учитель Онидзука вытворяет невозможные, иногда нелепые выходки, пытаясь перехитрить и победить класс 3-4, который намерен выдворить его из школы. В то же время другие препятствия представлены во всей красе, включая лысеющего заместителя директора Хироси Утиямаду, старых врагов со времён его принадлежности к банде и его собственных идиотских методов преподавания. Всё это встаёт на пути у Онидзуки, когда тот пытается помочь ученикам самого проблемного класса школы Сэйрин и своей прекрасной коллеге Адзусе Фуюцуки.

---

(source: shikimori)
description.tr:
Eikichi Onizuka ile tanışın, 22 yaşında eski bir motorcu. Kaba, ağzı bozuk ve anlık öfkesi var. Beklenmedik hedefi: Dünyanın En İyi Lise Öğretmeni olmak! Tabii ki öğretmen olmak istemesinin tek nedeni, seksi öğrencilerle birlikte olabilmek...
Tam bir eğitmen olmadan önce, diplomasını kazanmak için öğrenci öğretmen olarak çalışması gerekmektedir. Onizuka kampüsteki en sert adamın kendisi olduğunu düşünebilir ama zorbalar, şantajcılar ve entrikacı sadistlerle dolu sınıfıyla karşılaştığında bunu kanıtlamak zorunda kalacaktır.
description.uk: Ця історія про те, як колишній член банди «Онібаку» Онідзука Ейкічі, який присвятив усю юність бійкам та розвагам, вирішив стати найкрутішим учителем.

title.en: Gacha wo Mawashite Nakama wo Fuyasu Saikyou no Bishoujo Gundan wo Tsukuriagero

altTitles.en: Gacha Girl Corps
Isekai Bishoujo Gacha

altTitles.id: Menjadi Sultan untuk Menarik Gacha dan Ciptakan Tim Waifu Terkuat

altTitles.en: Spin Gacha, Recruit New Comrades, and Build The Strongest Army of Beautiful Girls!!

altTitles.ms: Tarik Gacha dan Buat Pasukan Gadis Cantik Terkuat untuk Bertarung Bersamamu

altTitles.en: Using Gacha to Increase My Companions and to Create the Strongest Girls’ Army Corps
You Increase Families and Make Beautiful Girl Army Corps, and put it up

altTitles.ru: Использование лотереи для усиления моих компаньонов и создания армейского корпуса сильнейших девушек

altTitles.ja: ガチャを回して仲間を増やす 最強の美少女軍団を作り上げろ

description.en:
For some reason, he was invited to another world after he rolled the gacha like he usually does.  
The gacha from the social game is available in his trusted smartphone.  
It was a convenient and cheat tool that can give out equipment and beautiful girl characters.  
He now aims to create the world's strongest army of beautiful girls in another world.
description.ja: ごく普通のソシャゲ廃人・大倉平八はガチャでゲットしたURアイテム【異世界への招待状】を使用したことにより、異世界転移してしまった。転移した直後にモンスターに襲われ、完全に詰んだかにみえた平八であったが—— スマホのガチャから美少女ユニットが具現化して現れた!?可愛い（壊れ）ガチャキャラと行く異世界ファンタジー！

title.en: My Ex-Wife Is Young Again And She's In My Class

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore no Kurasu ni Wakagaetta Moto Yome ga Iru

altTitles.ja: 俺のクラスに若返った元嫁がいる

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore no Class ni Wakagaetta Motoyome ga Iru

altTitles.vi: Có Nhỏ Vợ Cũ Hồi Xuân Trong Lớp Tôi

altTitles.ru: Помолодевшая бывшая жена в моём классе

altTitles.en: The Afterlife Class
The Otherworldly Class!

description.en: Choi Kanghee has no friends and is often misunderstood due to his scary appearance, but all he really wants in life are some friends. One day, he returned home to mourn for his grandmother's death anniversary, but a strange turn of events ends up reuniting Kanghee with his grandma! Can they work together to create new friends, or did it just turn more difficult?!

altTitles.ja: 竜と勇者と配達人

altTitles.en: The Dragon, the Hero, and the Courier

altTitles.fr: Le dragon, le héros, et la coursière

altTitles.pt-br: O dragão, o herói e o carteiro

altTitles.it: Il drago, l'eroe e il corriere

description.en:
"Hello fellow citizens. I am Yoshida the half-elf, working for the post office of the Imperial City of Idazig. My job is to deliver letters and documents to wherever you need them to be, whether it be a castle in the sky or the bottom of an abyss."

This is a comedy written by the biggest Middle-Ages geek, hitting the fantasy genre from an entirely new angle!

altTitles.ja: 美味しんぼ

altTitles.en: The Gourmet

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

altTitles.ja: 村井の恋

description.en:
Murai, a high school boy who is acting strangely, confesses his feelings to Tanaka-sensei, an Otome game geek, but is kicked out. The next day, Murai, who has a new haircut, looks a lot like Tanaka's "favorite character"...?!

---
Placed 2nd in the webcomic section of the 2019 Tsugimanga awards.

title.en: The Lecture You Would Never Want Your Parents To Give You

altTitles.ja: 親に絶対されたくない説教

altTitles.ja-ro: Oya ni Zettai sa Retakunai Sekkyou

altTitles.fr: Le sermon que vous ne voudriez jamais recevoir de vos parents

altTitles.ru: Лекция, которую вы бы не хотели услышать от родителей

altTitles.vi: Bài Thuyết Giáo mà ta Không bao giờ Muốn nghe từ phụ Huynh

altTitles.ja: にんげんに恋する死神ちゃん

altTitles.pt-br: A ceifadora se apaixona por um humano

altTitles.en: The Grim Reaper Falls in Love With a Human

altTitles.vi: Thần chết trót đem trọn tình yêu với một con người.

altTitles.id: Shinigami-chan yang jatuh cinta pada manusia

description.en:
_"You can see me again?"_

One day "Human" was overworked from his black company and about to die... and saw a Grim Reaper! But even though her job is to collect souls, "Grim-chan" instead takes care of "Human" so he doesn't die....?
description.ja:
「ちゃんと休め～～!!」
「また、あたしが見えてるな？」

残業過多で疲れ切ってる「にんげん」はある日、ブラックな労働環境に死にかけて……死神が見えてしまう。
しかし、魂の回収がお仕事なハズの「死神ちゃん」は、「にんげん」が心配のあまり死なないようにお世話をしてしまい――!?

「死神ちゃん」と過ごす、春夏秋冬。疲れ切ってるあなたに贈る、癒やしのフルカラー・ラブコメ・コミック!!

---

"Chanto yasume ~~!!"
 "Mata, atashi ga mie teru na?"

Zangyō kata de tsukare kitteru 'nin gen' wa aru hi, burakkuna rōdō kankyō ni shinikakete... shinigami ga miete shimau. Shikashi, tamashī no kaishū ga oshigotona hazu no 'shinigami-chan' wa,'ni n gen' ga shinpai no amari shinanai yō ni osewa o shite shimai ――!? 

`Shinigami-chan' to sugosu, shunkashūtō. Tsukare kitteru anata ni okuru, iyashi no furukarā rabukome komikku!!
description.pt-br: "Você pode me ver de novo?" Um dia o "Humano" estava sobrecarregado de trabalho de sua empresa abusiva e prestes a morrer... ele viu uma Ceifadora! Mas mesmo que seu trabalho seja coletar almas, "Grim-chan" decide cuidar do "Humano" para que ele não morra...?

description.en: A terrible virus has appeared in Seoul! On the same day Lee Yeongwoo and his classmates are traveling there. They are trapped in the tense atmosphere of Seoul, with the virus in the form of bubbles like frog eggs!
description.pt-br: Yeon Woo está apaixonado. Ele não tem olhos pra mais nada além da So Yeon. Na escola ele não conseguiu falar com ela, mas agora que eles estão indo pra uma excursão escolar em Seoul, ele tem esperança de conseguir pelo menos começar a conversar com ela, mesmo apesar de ser muito introvertido. Porém, tem coisas estranhas acontecendo em Seoul… Algo terrível está prestes a dominar a cidade… Nesse dia, Seoul de repente é…?

altTitles.ja: 桃源暗鬼

description.en: Ichinose Shiki, an inheritor of the blood of Oni had lived out his entire childhood oblivious to this fact. However, when an unknown man comes rushing into his home in attempts to assassinate him, his foster father finally reveals the truth. In a world where Oni and Momotarou have never been able to coexist, join Ichinose in his struggle for power and unifying the two races!

altTitles.ja: 若葉ちゃんはわからせたい！

altTitles.en: Wakaba-chan Wants To Make Him Understand!
Wakaba-chan Wants to Make It Clear

description.en:
Four-eyes who's bad with girls is only able to talk to with his tomboyish childhood friend Wakaba. But one day Wakaba appears before him in an amazingly cute outfit...!? 

This is a battle rom-com between Wakaba who wants to be loved and four-eyes who gets flustered by girls!!
description.ja: 『絶対BLになる世界VS絶対BLになりたくない男』の紺吉が贈るTwitter発ラブコメが、新連載開始！　女子が苦手な男子高校生のメガネくんは幼馴染のボーイッシュ女子・若葉とだけは会話ができる。でもある日、若葉がとびきり可愛い服装で現れて…!?　メガネくんに好かれたい若葉さんと女子にドキマギしちゃうメガネくんとのすれ違い＆攻防戦ラブコメ!!

description.en: Seo-jin develops an interest in Seung-woo during their school days, because of Seung-woo’s blank expression, devoid of emotion. When he catches Seung-woo’s gaze directed at him, Seo-jin realizes he causes temporary flashes of emotions on Seung-woo’s face. Feeling satisfied by this, he decides to befriend Seung-woo and stay by his side. One day, Seung-woo, who usually keeps his distance, finds he can’t stand it any longer…

title.en: Hana wa Saku, Shura no Gotoku

altTitles.ja: 花は咲く、修羅の如く

altTitles.en: Flower and Asura

altTitles.es-la: Las flores florecen, tal como Asura

description.en:
Hana, who lives on Tonaki Island, a small island with a population of 600, loves reciting so much that she holds public reading sessions for the children of the island. Mizuki feels that Hana's "reading" has the power to attract people, and invites her to join the broadcasting club, of which she is the head.

"Tell me your true wish and I'll make it come true."
"I want to join the broadcasting club."

Hana decides to join the club, and has many "firsts" with the members of the broadcasting club, deepening her love of reciting...
description.ja:
人口600人の小さな島・十鳴島に住む花奈は、島の子供たちに向けて朗読会を行うほど朗読が好きだった。花奈の〝読み〟に人を惹きつける力を感じた瑞希は、自身が部長を務める放送部へ誘う。

「お前の本当の願いを言え、アタシが叶えてやる」
「私、放送部に入りたいです」

入部を決意した花奈は、たくさんの〝初めて〟を放送部のメンバーと共にし、大好きな朗読を深めていく…。
description.th:
ฮานะอาศัยอยู่บนเกาะโทนาคิ เกาะเล็ก ๆ ที่มีประชากรเพียง 600 คน ซึ่งไม่มีคนที่อายุรุ่นราวคราวเดียวกันกับฮานะอยู่เลย เธอผู้ชื่นชอบการอ่านออกเสียง ได้จัดงานอ่านออกเสียงให้เด็ก ๆ บนเกาะฟังมาตั้งแต่สมัยยังอยู่ ป.4 ทำให้เธอเป็นขวัญใจของเด็ก ๆ
ต่อมาในวันก่อนที่เธอจะขึ้นม.ปลายหนึ่งวัน ก็ได้พบกับอุซุรากิ มิซุกิ รุ่นพี่ชมรมกระจายเสียงในโรงเรียนม.ปลาย สุโมโมะกาโอกะ ที่เธอกำลังจะไปเข้าเรียน...
และนั่นก็คือก้าวแรกสู่การเปลี่ยนแปลงของฮานะ

altTitles.en: Captain Tsubasa - Rising Sun - Part 1

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼　ライジングサン

description.en: Rising Sun will revolve around Tsubasa as he aims to participate in the Olympics as a representative from Japan.
In a world where energy is exhausted and resources are scarce, most of the world's resources are occupied by a few people. Slowly, an upper-level supernatural world called "Mirage" is established.

altTitles.en: Looking up to Magical Girls

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女にあこがれて

altTitles.en: I Admire Magical Girls, and...

description.en:
Hiiragi Utena, a girl who loves Magical Girls, lives her ordinary everyday life wishing to be like them. One day a curious character appears in front of her and offers her the power to make her wishes come true, but…  
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, the fierce battle begins!  

---
**Links:**

- [Alternative Official Release by Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/1110)
description.fr:
**Je fais des choses tellement horribles à mes Magical Girls préférées !**

Moi, c’est Utena Hiiragi, et comme toutes les filles de mon âge, j’adore les magical girls !
Un jour, une étrange créature aux allures de mascotte m’a lancé un sort, et je suis devenue capable de me transformer, moi aussi !
Je vais pouvoir me battre aux côtés de mes héroïnes préférées !
Enfin, c’est ce que je croyais…

C’est quoi, cette tenue scandaleuse ?
Et comment ça, je suis au service du Mal ?!

Mais qu’est-ce que c’est que cette histoire ?!

**La comédie BDSM dans laquelle s’affrontent des Magical Girls !!**

**Avec ses personnages tous plus fous les uns que les autres, Looking Up to Magical Girls balaye les genres et nous place du côté du mal ! Akihiro Ononaka déploie tout l’arsenal BDSM à sa disposition pour nous proposer un concentré d’humour légèrement sexy et complètement déjanté !**

---
**Links:**
- [Official French](https://www.amazon.fr/Looking-up-Magical-Girls-1/dp/2382750731/)
description.uk: Хііраґі Утена завжди захоплювалася чарівними дівчатами і мріяла перетворитися на круту героїню, яка бореться зі злом. Тож, коли одного вечора до неї підходить талісман, яка стверджує, що в ній дрімає магічна сила, вона тремтить від хвилювання. Але її барвиста мрія швидко розбивається об іронічний поворот подій, коли вона перетворюється на лиходійку!
description.es-la:
Hiiragi Utena, una chica que ama a las Chicas Mágicas, vive su vida cotidiana y desea ser como ellas.
Un día aparece un personaje curioso frente a ella y le ofrece el poder de hacer realidad sus deseos, pero...
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, ¡comienza la feroz batalla!
description.pt-br: Hiiragi Utena é uma garota apaixonada por Mahou Shoujo que sonhava em se tornar uma delas e poder lutar ao lado de sua heroína favorita. Certo dia, um mascote inesperadamente apareceu ao seu lado e lançou uma feitiço em Hiiragi, oferecendo a ela a oportunidade de estar de frente para sua ídolo. Entretanto, diferente do que ela esperava, a transformação a fez virar uma vilã ao invés de uma mahou shoujo. Para piorar, a mudança faz com que ela deixe de ser uma tímida garota e passe a ser uma dominatrix sádica. Agora Hiiragi precisará lidar com sua nova “profissão”, ao mesmo tempo que tenta aproveitar os momentos ao lado de sua heroína, por mais que seja para tentar torturá-la.

altTitles.en: Master Unexpectedly Wants to Kill Me

description.en:
Super luck newbie disciple X Sly superb doormat master.
Watch to see how the scheming flower "Sasa is quite lucky" game on in the world of 《Fate》! - Sasa: "Master~ Let's go to the next instance dungeon to get some new items! - One Fold: "Dammit, when will I be able to get rid of this idiotic disciple?!"

altTitles.ja-ro: Eris no Seihai: Konyaku Haki Sareta Reijou wa, Kidai no Akujo ni Tasukerareta Daisho Toshite Fukushuu ni Tsuki Awasaremasu

altTitles.ja: エリスの聖杯 ～婚約破棄された令嬢は、稀代の悪女に助けられた代償として復讐に付き合わされます～

description.en:
Constance, the daughter to a Viscount whose only value is her honesty, and Scarlet Castiel, the most reviled villainess of the era who was sentenced to death ten years ago. When the two people who were never supposed to meet encountered one another at a night party, the story that should have ended with Scarlet's death began anew.  
  
Although their relationship only began out of mutual interest, they soon became true partners in an effort to unravel the mysteries of a grand conspiracy borne out of the past, that still has a vicious grip on the present.

altTitles.en: A Certain Scientific Mental Out

altTitles.ja: とある科学の心理掌握

description.en: The Tokiwadai student council election is approaching. Shokuhou Misaki, one of the leading candidates, is in the midst of an election campaign in spite of her own expectations due to the people around her and the fate of being the head of the largest clique...!!
description.id: Pemilihan presiden dewan siswa Tokiwadai semakin mendekat. Shokuhou Misaki, salah satu kandidat utama, tengah berada dalam kampanye pemilihan meskipun tidak sesuai ekspektasinya sendiri karena pengaruh orang-orang di sekitarnya dan takdir menjadi kepala kelompok terbesar...!!
description.ru: Приближаются выборы в студенческий совет Токивадая. Шокухо Мисаки, одна из ведущих кандидатов, находится в разгаре избирательной кампании, несмотря на ее собственные ожидания из-за окружающих ее людей и судьбы быть главой крупнейшей клики!..

altTitles.en: The Reincarnation Record of a Misanthrope

altTitles.ja: ぼっち転生記

description.en:
I don't trust any human being.  
  
An unemployed, virgin 29-years-old Loner man who has a very deep distrust toward humans was trying to save a woman who was almost raped. He is stabbed in the chest by the assaulter and left to die alone while cursing the humans. When he came to, he realized that he had reincarnated in another world as the second son of a lower noble family where magic and spirit exist as a human baby named Ash Hawkwood.  
  
Without talent for [True Magic] or [Swordmanship] this the story about how he build his own empire from scratch by using his own power.

Hana was never first. Always because Han Geon Woo came in first every time!
Hana would do anything to best Geon Woo, even though she can't figure him out.
This time, she tried to shock him by confessing...
He believed and accepted the confession though? 
Does he like me?

title.en: Onee-sama to Watashi: Ojou-sama ga Isekai Tensei

altTitles.ja: お姉さまと巨人（わたし）～お嬢さまが異世界転生～

altTitles.zh: 姐姐大人和巨人(我)～大小姐转生进入异世界～

altTitles.en: Sister and Giant: A Young Lady Is Reborn in Another World
My Sister and Giant: A young lady is reborn in another world.

altTitles.ja-ro: Onee-sama to Kyojin (Watashi): Ojou-sama ga Isekai Tensei

altTitles.es-la: La hermana mayor y la Gigante (Yo): La señorita reencarnada en otro mundo

altTitles.ja: お姉さまと巨人 お嬢さまが異世界転生

altTitles.en: The Onee-sama and the Giant
My Sister And The Giant (Me): A Young Lady Is Reborn In Another World

description.en:
Hinako, a girl who came from another world, made a vow of sisterhood with a giant called Elis, and together they became known as 'The Smallest Giants'. They both have goals that aligned in tracking down people who were significant to them. For Hinako, it is her 'Onee-sama' who was also transported to this world, and for Elis it's the kin she was separated from. However, when collecting their reward after fulfilling a request at the guild, Hinako caught the eye of a knight who serves the church... 

This is the story of a Young Lady and a Giant, two girls who were born to different races and different worlds, and the quest to find their "loved ones" which binds them together.
description.id:
Tidak ada kemampuan (Cheat),  Karena itu merupakan kecurangan.

Hinako, merupakan orang yang bereinkarnasi dari dunia lain, sedang mencari "saudarinya"  yang juga bereinkarnasi ke dunia lain. Dan Alice yang juga sedang mencari saudara laki-lakinya, karena mereka memiliki tujuan yang sama, Hinako menandatangani perjanjian persaudaraan dengan raksasa Alice yang disebut sebagai "raksasa terkecil."

Namun, ketika mereka menyelesaikan sebuah misi, mereka diperhatikan oleh seorang pria yang merupakan ksatria gereja.

Kisah reinkarnasi ke dunia fantasy yang menghubungkan seorang wanita muda dan seorang raksasa, mencari dua "orang berharga" dari ras dan tempat kelahiran yang berbeda.

Dimulai.
description.ja:
能力(チート)なし。それは、ズルですから。

異世界転生者ヒナコは巨人エイリスと姉妹の契を交わし「最も小さな巨人」と呼ばれていた。
同じく転生したであろうヒナコの『お姉さま』と、エイリスの兄弟を捜すため、お互いの目的が一致したがため。 しかし、ある依頼を精算する際に教会騎士の男に目をつけられてしまう――。

お嬢さまと巨人、種族も生まれも違う２人の『大切な人』を捜す、絆を結ぶ異世界転生ファンタジー、開幕。
description.es-la:
Hinako, es una de las reencarnadas de otro mundo, fue llamada "la gigante más pequeña" después de que ella y la gigante Eiris se unieran como hermanas porque tienen el mismo objetivo; encontrar a sus seres queridos. Hinako busca a su hermana, que también puede haberse reencarnado, y a los hermanos de Eiris. Sin embargo, al resolver cierta petición, un caballero de la iglesia le llama la atención, y se ve obligada a arriesgarse.

La historia de una joven y un gigante, dos personas de diferente raza y nacimiento, que buscan a sus "seres queridos", comienza en esta fantasía de reencarnación de otro mundo que los une.

title.en: Mahou to Boku to Dekkai Shishou

altTitles.ja: 魔法と僕とでっかい師匠

altTitles.zh: 魔法与我与伟大的师父

altTitles.en: Magic, Me, and My Big Master!

description.en:
Hinata, who longs to be a wizard, heads to the mansion of a "Cursed Eye Witch" who can control people's hearts at will. What appeared there was Esmeralda, a terrifying witch with a huge body that made you look up at her. However, her true identity is a shy witch who loves Hinata so much that she can't help it!!
A romantic comedy between master and student that will make your heart flutter due to the height difference and the gap between the witch and her disciple.

altTitles.en: The Unwanted Undead Adventurer

altTitles.zh-hk: 事與願違的不死冒險者

altTitles.ja: 望まぬ不死の冒険者

description.en:
It's been ten years since Rentt Faina, a down-on-his luck Bronze-class adventurer, set his eyes on becoming Mithril-class. Unfortunately, Rentt finds himself helpless when confronted by a legendary Dragon in the Labyrinth of the Moon's Reflection...and is summarily eaten.

But Rentt has miraculously reawakened... as a skeleton?
description.ja:
最高位の神銀級冒険者を目指して十年。いまだ銅級冒険者のレントは、いつものように単独で《水月の迷宮》に潜り、鍛錬と日銭稼ぎをするつもり――だった。だが、初心者向けの迷宮にいるはずもない《龍》と遭遇。圧倒的な力の前に為す術なく喰われてしまう。

そして、死んだはずのレントは“目覚めた”――『骨人（スケルトン）』の姿で。

途方にくれたレントだったが魔物の持つ『存在進化』を用い人間を目指すことを決意。迷宮でひとり魔物へと挑み始める！
description.ru:
Однажды авантюрист медного ранга Рент наткнулся на неизвестный проход в лабиринте, и хоть всё говорило о том, что не стоит идти туда, парень всё же пошёл. На этом его жизнь закончилась . Но он не умер, а проснулся не человеком, а скелетом. И теперь всё, что он может — развиваться как нежить.

(Source: mangalib)
description.pt-br: O protagonista é um aventureiro da classe bronze, que mora em Malt, localizada na fronteira do Reino de Yaran. Por azar, se encontra com um poderoso monstro dentro do labirinto, e acaba sendo devorado. Quando recobrou a consciência ele percebe que se tornou um "Esqueleto". Não podendo falar e não podendo voltar para a cidade devido a sua condição atual, ele se lembra da existência da evolução existêncial, que nada mais é que o fato dos monstros poderem evoluir para outras formas derrotando oponentes. Com o objetivo de ganhar um corpo com carne, além de só ossos, ele vai começar sua épica jornada, eliminando tudo que ver pela frente...

title.en: Tokyo Cannabis Special Ward - The Guy Called Cannabis King

altTitles.ja: 東京カンナビス特区 大麻王と呼ばれた男

altTitles.ja-ro: Toukyou Cannabis Tokku - Taimaou to Yobareta Otoko
Tokyo Cannabis Tokku - Taimaou to Yobareta Otoko

altTitles.en: Tokyo Cannabis Special Zone - A Man Called the Cannabis King
Toukyou Cannabis Special Ward - The Guy Called Cannabis King
A Man Called the Cannabis King in the Tokyo Cannabis Special Zone

altTitles.vi: Đặc khu Cần Sa Tokyo - Người đàn ông được mệnh danh là Vua Cần Sa

description.en: An owner of a flower shop has a deficit management, then he encounter the forbidden plant cannabis.
description.ja: 花屋を営む千東森生(41)は、妻と高校生の娘との 3 人暮らし。花屋の経営は芳しくなく、妻はパートに出て、なんとか生計を立てていた。そんな折に届いた大学の同窓会の報せ。妻に後押しされ、同窓会へ参加した森生は、かつての親友・加賀山に声をかけられる。久々の再会に、昔を懐かしむ森生だったが、加賀山からとある仕事を提案され…。
description.vi: Chito Morio, một người đàn ông 41 tuổi, chủ của một cửa hàng hoa đang chung sống cùng vợ và cô con gái hiện đang học cấp 3 của mình. Tuy nhiên tình hình kinh doanh của cửa hàng ngày càng trở nên ế ẩm đã khiến vợ anh buộc phải ra ngoài làm thêm để giảm bớt gánh nặng kinh tế cho gia đình. Đang trong cơn túng quẫn thì đột nhiên, Morio nhận được thông báo họp lớp đại học và rồi anh đã quyết định tham dự buổi hội mặt đáng nhớ ấy sau khi được vợ mình hết lòng động viên. Thế rồi cuộc đời Morio bắt đầu bước sang trang mới kể từ lúc anh đã gặp lại người bạn thân ngày ấy là Kagayama cũng đến tham dự buổi họp lớp. Trong khi cả hai đang ngồi hàn huyên lại chuyện xưa thì Kagayama bất ngờ giới thiệu cho anh một công việc béo bở có thể kiếm được bộn tiền.

altTitles.ja: ドラゴンボール超

description.en:
Dragon Ball Super follows the aftermath of Goku's fierce battle with Majin Buu, as he attempts to maintain earth's fragile peace.

Having defeated Majin Buu, Goku is starting to get bored with his life on Earth. His wife, Chi-chi, wants him to get a job, but all he wants to do is train and fight stronger enemies. Elsewhere in the universe, the God of Destruction, Beerus, and his attendant Whis are traveling from planet to planet in search of food and entertainment. 

After blowing up some hapless victims, Beerus is reminded of a man from his dreams with the moniker “Super Saiyan God,” or something like that... The God of Destruction sets his sights on Earth to track down this mysterious man! Maybe this will give Goku something to do?
description.pt-br: Dragon Ball Super segue as consequências da batalha feroz de Goku com Majin Buu, enquanto ele tenta manter a frágil paz da Terra.
